name: Rogue runner (itch) (ArrieBoy22)
description:
This is Rogue Runner. A unity project that I worked on for a while but lost interest. I thought I'd upload it to itch.io before I probably delete it, so here it is.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Arrow keys to move  

Inventory:

1 - slot 1

2 - slot 2

P to pause/inventory (crafting too)

TAB for build mode (only if you have craft-able items)

In build mode press 1-2 to switch what you're building

In build mode with plank selected press "q" to change direction

In build mode LMB to place (left click)

Hope I got everything
